short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: City's success got you down? Fear not, the Blues Blocker by Paddy Power is your shield against the relentless Man City parade!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Blues Blocker, your ultimate shield against the relentless Manchester City success parade!

Developed by Paddy Power, this ingenious Chrome extension saves you from the never-ending bombardment of Man City news, gloating and boasting, allowing you to restore balance to your footballing universe.

With just a few taps, the Blues Blocker becomes your personal guardian, meticulously erasing all traces of Man City's triumphs this season from your digital world. Bid farewell to endless headlines and articles glorifying their Premier League and FA Cup victories.

Brace yourself for sweet relief with our shield from the impending tsunami of news coverage should Man City clinch the treble by conquering Inter Milan in the upcoming Champions League Final.

Better yet, the Blues Blocker also shoves a sock in the mouth of the loudmouth Oasis brothers, Liam and Noel Gallagher, by removing them entirely from your Twitter feed.

The Blues Blocker promises to provide a breath of fresh air for football fans drowning in a sea of sky-blue saturation.

Download the free Blues Blocker, courtesy of Paddy Power today.
